title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 281.5 - Limitation of time for institution of appeal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 281.5 - Limitation of time for institution of appeal

State Regulations

An appeal to the commissioner must be instituted within 15
days from the appellant's receipt of written notice of the chancellor's
decision. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
281.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
